author: Rizaldi Tri Yanuar
comment: It's a really nice watch, but the seconds do not move when the screen is dimmed. Also, maybe you can add notifications on the dimmed screen. I'm using Xperia Z3
title: Nice watch

author: Mohammed Shafi Musthafa Ali
comment: It will be better if it have animated emojis! Please add some animation effect!
title: I love it!

author: Warren Shelton
comment: Very original face. My new favorite!!!!!! Perfect as is, but animations or interactive features would be cool :)
title: Love this!!!!
